actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for rates of duty on imported speedometers used on exercise equipment consistent with those on bicycle speedometers.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide a duty on bicycle and exerciser-type speedometers and parts. Provides for staged duty rate reductions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for rates of duty on imported speedometers used on exercise equipment consistent with those on bicycle speedometers.
